mapper.insert: insert into mikufun_resource_information ( file_name, file_uuid, file_hash, file_size, transfer_format, video_duration, image_url, subtitle_path, exact_match, resource_id, resource_name, episode_title, type, episode_id, danmaku_shift, gid ) values ( #{fileName}, #{fileUuid}, #{fileHash}, #{fileSize}, #{transferFormat}, #{videoDuration}, #{imageUrl}, #{subtitlePath} #{exactMatch}, #{resourceId}, #{resourceName}, #{episodeTitle}, #{type}, #{episodeId}, #{danmakuShift}, #{gid} )
mapper.update: update mikufun_resource_information set exact_match = #{exactMatch}, resource_id = #{resourceId}, resource_name = #{resourceName}, episode_title = #{episodeTitle}, type = #{type}, episode_id = #{episodeId} where file_id = #{fileId}
mapper.select: select file_id, file_name, fileUuid, file_hash, file_size, transfer_format, video_duration, image_url, subtitle_path, recent_play_time, recent_play_position, download_time, exact_match, resource_id, resource_name, episode_title, type, episode_id, danmaku_shift, gid from mikufun_resource_information where file_id = #{fileId}

select file_id, file_name, fileUuid, file_hash, file_size, transfer_format, video_duration, image_url, subtitle_path, recent_play_time, recent_play_position, download_time, exact_match, resource_id, resource_name, episode_title, type, episode_id, danmaku_shift, gid from mikufun_resource_information order by recent_play_time DESC limit 20

select file_id, file_name, fileUuid, file_hash, file_size, transfer_format, video_duration, image_url, subtitle_path, recent_play_time, recent_play_position, download_time, exact_match, resource_id, resource_name, episode_title, type, episode_id, danmaku_shift, gid from mikufun_resource_information order by download_time DESC limit 20

select file_id, file_name, fileUuid, file_hash, file_size, transfer_format, video_duration, image_url, subtitle_path, recent_play_time, recent_play_position, download_time, exact_match, resource_id, resource_name, episode_title, type, episode_id, danmaku_shift, gid from mikufun_resource_information where resource_id = #{resourceId} order by file_name
select DISTINCT resource_id, resource_name from mikufun_resource_information

select file_id, file_name, fileUuid, file_hash, file_size, transfer_format, video_duration, image_url, subtitle_path, recent_play_time, recent_play_position, download_time, exact_match, resource_id, resource_name, episode_title, type, episode_id, danmaku_shift, gid from mikufun_resource_information order by file_name
